* thermal stability

* bandgap
* field-effect mobilities

* good
* high
* broad

* high

* good (solubility)
* high (thermal stability, field-effect mobilities, photovoltaic properties)
* broad (absorption)
* low (bandgap)
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Value of Material Property.

Sure, here are the entities that clearly refer to the value of a material property:

* high (thermal stability, field-effect mobilities, photovoltaic properties)
* low (bandgap)

The entity "broad" does not clearly refer to the value of a material property, so it can be removed.

Therefore, the "Property Value" entities in the paragraph are:

* high (thermal stability, field-effect mobilities, photovoltaic properties)
* low (bandgap)
